questions.text: Who changed the sign "Bartlet For President" to "Bartlet Is the President"?
questions.explanation:
Toby.

	Toby (to Bruno): "Whose throat do I shove this down? Whose skull do I crack with this sign?"

questions.text: In the barn, what scared two senior staffers?
questions.explanation:
snake.

	Josh (hopping up on his chair): "Seriously, that's a pretty big snake."

questions.text: Did Bartlet apologize to the gang for his lie?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Bartlet: "It occurs to me, I never said I'm sorry. I am. For the lawyers, for the press, for the mess."

questions.text: Who told CJ about the MS?
questions.explanation:
Leo.

	CJ told this to the press when she was asked who told her.

questions.text: When flashing back to Washington, who got left out in the rain jumping up and down trying to get someone to stop?
questions.explanation:
Joey.

	Josh: "I just thought you were happy."   Ed: "Me too."  Joey: "You're an idiot."  Josh: "Which one of us are you talking too?"

questions.text: What did Abbey tell Jed he couldn't have been because of his fears?
questions.explanation:
Astronaut.

	Abbey: "You're afraid of heights, speed, fire and small places."

questions.text: In Air Force One, who has a cabin besides the President?
Like poker, Charlie doesn't play pool very well.
questions.explanation:
False.

	He won forty dollars when he and Toby played.

questions.text: Who wanted to lock everyone in the barn and set fire to it?
questions.explanation:
Bruno.

	Bruno was upset that they weren't getting anywhere on the speech because someone always had something to say about a part of it.

questions.text: Who is not allowed to make appointments on their own?
questions.explanation:
Leo.

	Margaret: "Do I need to explain the rules on making appointments again? Are you confused?"

questions.text: According to Leo, who else besides him shouldn't be a marriage counselor?
questions.explanation:
Toby.

	Toby: "You and I would be really good at it."

questions.text: Does the President accept CJ's resignation?
Unlike Ed and Larry, who gets to ride in the motorcade?
Where did the gang stay as they waited for the President to make his speech?
questions.explanation:
Classroom.

	CJ (to Josh): "I don't know, desks, a blackboard--could be some kind of classroom."
